definition: without deviation, lacking compromising or mitigating elements, plan and direct (a complex undertaking)
details:
adverb
- without deviation
= example: without deviation
= synonyms: straight
adjective
- lacking compromising or mitigating elements
- direct in spatial dimensions
- (of a current) flowing in one direction only
= example: (of a current) flowing in one direction only
- straightforward in means or manner or behavior or language or action
= example: straightforward in means or manner or behavior or language or action
- similar in nature or effect or relation to another quantity
= example: similar in nature or effect or relation to another quantity
- moving from west to east on the celestial sphere
= example: moving from west to east on the celestial sphere
- having no intervening persons, agents, conditions
= example: having no intervening persons, agents, conditions
= synonyms: unmediated
- in precisely the same words used by a writer or speaker
= example: in precisely the same words used by a writer or speaker
= synonyms: verbatim
- in a straight unbroken line of descent from parent to child
= synonyms: lineal
- being an immediate result or consequence
= example: being an immediate result or consequence
verb
- plan and direct (a complex undertaking)
= synonyms: engineer, mastermind, organise, organize, orchestrate
- specifically design a product, event, or activity for a certain public
= synonyms: aim
- command with authority
= example: command with authority
- give directions to
= example: give directions to
- put an address on (an envelope)
= synonyms: address
- intend (something) to move towards a certain goal
= synonyms: place
- point or cause to go (blows, weapons, or objects such as photographic equipment) towards
= synonyms: aim
- guide the actors in (plays and films)
- lead, as in the performance of a composition
= synonyms: conduct
- direct the course
= example: direct the course
= synonyms: maneuver
- cause to go somewhere
= synonyms: send
- take somebody somewhere
= synonyms: take
- be in charge of
= synonyms: head
